name: shock wave
description:
On the Silent Night of All Saints, monsters come to the human world at night. mischievous monsters accidentally infect small monsters that invade teeth. When the number of small monsters increases too much, monsters will become angry and harm humans. As the contract guardian of monsters, you will not be afraid to challenge and eliminate these small monsters, allowing them to spend the night happily and saving humans from disasters. It's time to click the mouse and compete with the little monsters!

Game operation methods

Mobile=WASD

Shooting=Left mouse button

Gameplay

You need to manipulate the character to constantly move. And avoid monsters

When you are touched by monsters, you will lose health points

Use weapons to shoot monsters in order to eliminate them

Keep alive!
